deprecated_yaml.title: The SamsungTV YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring SamsungTV using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the SamsungTV YAML configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

Please note that previously configured `turn_on_action` needs to be manually converted to use the `turn_on` trigger ([documentation]({on_action_url})).
